string-array.name: third_party_libs
string-array.item: Android Support Libraries#AOSP#https://developer.android.com/topic/libraries/support-library/index.html#The Android Support Library offers backward-compatible versions of a number of features that are not built into the framework.
Android Architecture Components#AOSP#https://developer.android.com/topic/libraries/architecture/index.html#A new collection of libraries that help you design robust, testable, and maintainable apps.
Apollo#lsxiao#https://github.com/lsxiao/Apollo#ğŸš€ Awesome EventBus by RxJava.

Glide#bumptech#https://github.com/bumptech/glide#Glide is a fast and efficient open source media management and image loading framework for Android that wraps media decoding, memory and disk caching, and resource pooling into a simple and easy to use interface.
GlideTransformations#wasabeef#https://github.com/wasabeef/glide-transformations#An Android transformation library providing a variety of image transformations for Glide.
LabelView#JonnyHsia#https://github.com/jonnyhsia/LabelView#A convenient and powerful layout library to create label easily.
MaterialEditText#rengwuxian#https://github.com/rengwuxian/MaterialEditText#The EditText in Material Design, with more features that Google Material Design Spec has introduced.
MultiType#Drakeet#https://github.com/drakeet/MultiType#An Android library to create multiple item types list views easily and flexibly.
RecyclerViewSnap#rubensousa#https://github.com/rubensousa/RecyclerViewSnap#Gravity snap helper for recycler view.
Retrofit#Square#https://github.com/square/retrofit#Type-safe HTTP client for Android and Java by Square, Inc.
RxBinding#JakeWharton#https://github.com/JakeWharton/RxBinding#RxJava binding APIs for Android UI widgets from the platform and support libraries.

RxJava#ReactiveX#https://github.com/ReactiveX/RxJava#RxJava is a Java VM implementation of Reactive Extensions: a library for composing asynchronous and event-based programs by using observable sequences.
